channel.title: Multiplayer not working for me! :(
channel.description: Been trying to look for servers to join in but nothing shows up i just get "No internet games responded to the query", its a bummer since I've seen people play this online but i guess i cant no matter what i do i hope this could be fixed...

item.title: Multiplayer not working for me! :(
item.dc:creator: TextFAMGUY1
item.description:
Yeah, it’s probably a firewall thing, most likely. Might also be worth checking that the standard Source network port (27015) is properly forwarded to your local IP address on your router.

Read full topic

item.title: Multiplayer not working for me! :(
item.dc:creator: AvoidPaypal
item.description:
halophonia:

Been trying to look for servers to join in but nothing shows up i just get “No internet games responded to the query”, its a bummer since I’ve seen people play this online but i guess i cant no matter what i do i hope this could be fixed…

Check your firewall settings & allow outbound access to bms.exe

Read full topic

item.title: Multiplayer not working for me! :(
item.dc:creator: MatiasKiller21
item.description:
Try to find server in Internet browser and open the console & write “connect IP”
